---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Next batch of results (Pix Merchant Payment Reversal Inbound search)"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/merchant/payment/reversal/inbound/search/scroll"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the next batch of results of Pix Merchant Payment Reversal Inbound search (/pix/merchant/payment/reversal/inbound/search/to-scroll).

The time between each request must be less than 2 minutes.

The results that are returned from a scroll request reflect the state of the data at the time that the initial search request. Subsequent changes will only affect later search requests.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["scrollId"],"type":"object","properties":{"scrollId":{"description":"scroll ID to retrieve the next batch of results for the request","type":"string"}},"example":{"scrollId":"DXF1ZXJ5QW5kRmV0Y2gBAAAAAAAAAD4WYm9laVYtZndUQlNsdDcwakFMNjU1QQ=="},"title":"ScrollRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
